definition: directly facing each other, of leaves etc, a word that expresses a meaning opposed to the meaning of another word, in which case the two words are antonyms of each other
details:
adverb
- directly facing each other
= synonyms: face-to-face
adjective
- of leaves etc
= synonyms: paired
- characterized by opposite extremes
= synonyms: polar, diametric, diametrical
- altogether different in nature or quality or significance
= example: altogether different in nature or quality or significance
- the other one of a complementary pair
= example: the other one of a complementary pair
- being directly across from each other
- moving or facing away from each other
= example: moving or facing away from each other
noun
- a word that expresses a meaning opposed to the meaning of another word, in which case the two words are antonyms of each other
= synonyms: antonym, opposite word
- a contestant that you are matched against
= synonyms: opposition
- a relation of direct opposition
= synonyms: reverse, contrary
- something inverted in sequence or character or effect
= synonyms: inverse
